forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low near 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 52F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low around 45F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High near 15C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 59F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 16C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 62F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
